titleStmt.title: A message of peace in a letter consolatorie and consiliatory to a neighbor minister for resolution in severall queres, but principally about the use of the liturgie together with a friendly letter sent to Sir Edward Deering about the time of his commitment, by way of answere to his last speech : as also, concerning the liturgie and church-discipline / .
titleStmt.author: T. R.

notesStmt.note: "A message of peace" and the letter to Deering signed: T. R.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
